snippet: Athletic Director Jack Swarbrick says a university investigation uncovered nothing criminal and no N.C.A.A. rules violations.
abstract: Notre Dame Athletic Director Jack Swarbrick defends university's actions concerning linebacker Manti Te'o during interview, saying it was Te'o's decision not to notify law enforcement or correct public record regarding his girlfriend.

byline.contributor: Steve Eder contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Athletic Director Jack Swarbrick says a university investigation uncovered nothing criminal and no N.C.A.A. rules violations.

headline.seo: Manti Te’o Hoax Disclosure Was Up to Him, Notre Dame Says
headline.main: After Inquiry, Notre Dame Decided Revealing Te’o Hoax Was Up to Him
headline.print_headline: After Inquiry, Notre Dame Decided Revealing Te’o Hoax Was Up to Him
